# Week 1: Introduction to R

## In-Class Links:

[Link to install R](https://cran.r-project.org/)

[Link to install R Studio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)

## Activity:

1.  Install the following packages into your local R environment:

    1.  Tidyverse
    2.  ggplot2
    3.  readr
    4.  readxl
    5.  stringr

2.  Send Cameron an email with what types of stats (t-test, ANOVA, linear regression) you want to learn to do using R.

If you need help, look at the code we ran in class [here.](examples/week_1/classcode_wk1.html)
